-- Anachronox / Pacifix / Crossroads --

Anachronox nods and follows Belthassan. He enters the storage room 
and looks for two bots.

----------------------

"Alright," confirms Pacifix, "I'll see you in a little while. Pacifix 
out." Pacifix pauses a moment to reflect, then stands. He looks into 
the monitors, and frowns, <Where's Crossroads, he should be done 
showing Gesper around by now. I'll have to find him.> Pacifix turns 
and walks towards the exit of the control room.

----------------------

Crossroads nods, "I think so, he was anxious to find out how 
Firedrill was doing. He's probably contacted the Shadow Destiny by 
now." As the continue down the corridor, he shrugs, "I wonder how 
Firedrill's doing. I'll ask Pacifix when we find him."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Belthassan: Gesper is at the Autobot base. He acts there as our 
> ambassador. Being a techno-organic is being both a machine and an 
> animal, but it is more than that. It is hard to explain though. I 
hall 
> explain it to you later, as well as the mission. For now... (he 
enters 
> the storage room) let me introduce Tankor and Melchana.
> 
> -------------------------
> 
> Daemos: I understand, Pacifix. Here is our base's location. We will 
> hold the shield down for your arrival.
> 
> -------------------------
> 
> Gesper: I wonder if Pacifix has gotten any news from the Shadow 
> Destiny. What do you think, Crossroads?
